MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the PA14 and PA15 postcode areas of Port Glasgow and Greenock. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.53pm. Our emergency response team are in the local area carrying out investigations and will commence repairs to get the power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will update this message to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10PM on Thursday 18 February 2021.
